description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bromley v Swindon Town in League Two.
title: Bromley v Swindon Town: League Two stats & head-to-head
title_page: Bromley v Swindon Town: League Two stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Swindon Town’s last game against Bromley as a Football League side was in November 1976 in the first round of the FA Cup, with the Robins winning 7-0.
Swindon have won just one of their last six Football League games against newly promoted sides (D2 L3), scoring nine goals and conceding 12 in that time.
Six of Bromley’s last eight league games on a weekend have been drawn (W1 L1), though are unbeaten in each of their last five such games (W1 D4).
Swindon have won their last league game of the year in each of the past two years and will be looking to win three such matches in succession for the first time since 1987.
